definition: meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: BACKGROUND To observe the therapeutic effects of transplantation of conjunctival flap for pterygium.
sentences.chinese: 观察单纯结膜瓣移植治疗翼状胬肉的疗效。

sentences.english: Pterygium stop growing or slow growth.
sentences.chinese: 翼状胬肉停止生长或缓慢生长。

sentences.english: The recurrent rate was reduced. Conclusions Limbus epithelial stem cell autografting for treatment of pterygium is effective.
sentences.chinese: 结论自体角膜缘干细胞移植治疗翼状胬肉可行性好。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the operations for preventing recrudescence of pterygium.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨预防翼状胬肉复发的手术方法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the effect of pterygium excision with limbal autografts.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨自体角膜缘移植在翼状胬肉治疗中的作用。

sentences.english: No recurrence was observed in both groups at the end of 6-month follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 术后6个月随访期内两组均未见胬肉复发。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effects of limbal epithelial autograft transplantation for treatment of pterygium.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察自体角膜缘上皮移植术治疗翼状胬肉的疗效。

sentences.english: Methods 54 eyes of 46 patients with recurrent pterygium.
sentences.chinese: 方法复发性翼状胬肉患者46例54眼。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the dose-effect relationship between the radiation of ultraviolet ray and the onset of pterygium quantitatively.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究紫外线辐射与翼状胬肉发病的量效关系。

sentences.english: Pterygia are caused by collagen degeneration and fibrovascular proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 翼状胬肉因胶原变性及纤维血管增生而产生。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
eye floaters (moving spots in the eye's vitreous humor)
